The Terminator

Rank: 670


A cyborg assassin from the future attempts to find and kill a young woman who is destined to give birth to a warrior that will lead a resistance to save humankind from extinction.


Director: James Cameron

Writer: James Cameron, Gale Anne Hurd, William Wisher

Stars: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Michael Biehn

Tags: Artificial Intelligence, Cyberpunk, Dystopian Sci,Fi, Time Travel, Urban Adventure, Action, Adventure, Sci,Fi
